features: OneBlade 360 doesn't shave as close as a traditional blade, so your skin stays comfortable. Go against the grain and shave off any length of hair easily.
TRIM IT DOWN - 5-in-1 open comb design for an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine - even on long and thick hair.
EDGE IT UP - Line up your style in seconds with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to create precise edges.
SHAVE IT OFF - the innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control.
Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months. (For best shaving experience. Based on 2 full shaves per week. Actual results may vary.)
body.description: The Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 is a revolutionary new electric grooming technology designed for men who wear facial styles, beards, or stubble. Its dual- protection system, a glide coating combined with rounded tips, makes shaving easier and comfortable. Its shaving technology features a fast-moving cutter (12000x per min) so it's efficient, even on longer hairs. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control. Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas, with fewer strokes and greater comfort. Create precise edges with the dual-sided blade. You can shave in either direction to get great visibility and see every hair that you're cutting. Line up your style in seconds! OneBlade doesn't shave as close as traditional blade - so your skin stays comfortable. Unique 5-in-1 open comb design provides an efficient trim without clogging and interrupting your routine, even on long and thick hair. OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it is easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can shave wet or dry, even in the shower. No shaving foam needed. Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use** to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. Fully rechargeable, the OneBlade 360 Face delivers 45 minutes of continuous shaving power after an 8-hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shaver I've used so far!
reviews.reviewText: This thing gives me a good shave and I don't get a bunch of ingrown hairs or eviscerate my face when I use it. It's simple and comfortable enough to use that I shave a lot more than I used to.I have hand tremors. Anyone who also has to deal with them understands how much of a literal pain shaving can be. I gave up using razors because I was tired of slicing myself up. This allows me to get a nice close shave without a ton of cuts like I'd get with a traditional razor. You can still nick yourself if you hit a wrinkle or bump too aggressively but otherwise this is a no pain shaver. Unlike the old circle blade shavers I've tried this is quick and comfortable to use. I don't have to spend 20 minutes running it over the same spot 100 different ways hoping this time it'll get that one stray hair, most I've needed is a third pass on a really stubborn one. Again, I shave a lot more often than I used to now and even with my tremors it makes detailing much easier. I feel a lot better because I legitimately look better. It's especially great for around the ears if you cut your own hair. The guide comb is also really good and easy to use so far. My facial hair absolutely loves to get ingrown and make me look like I've got a ton of zits if shaved too close. This shaver trims just right to look good but not cause me to look like I've got a break out the next day. It's also really easy to clean thanks to it's water resistance.The downsides I've encountered that I'd attribute to the shaver itself is it doesn't seem to have the strongest grip on the head and there's often some redness where I've used it. The head has popped off on me a couple times but never while shaving and never in a way that actually broke either the head or handle. The redness isn't really bad in my case and is usually gone by the time I'm out of the shower but it is there. Would rather have a bit of redness than go back to any other shaver I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed and Satisfied - A 5-Star OneBlade Experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 Face, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This hybrid electric beard trimmer and shaver, complete with the 5-in-1 face stubble comb, have truly exceeded my expectations. From the moment I received it in its frustration-free packaging, I knew I made the right choice. The price point is fair for the quality and versatility this device offers. The trimmer not only works well but also provides a precise and comfortable grooming experience.I'm confident in the longevity of this product; it seems built to last. Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase and believe it's well worth the money. If you're in the market for a reliable and efficient grooming tool, the Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 Face won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Close shave, Quiet, Light weight.
reviews.reviewText: If you have sensitive skin. It only works for dry shave. Also, don’t press too hard against your skin. Other than that.. 5 Stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Trimmer, Okay Razor
reviews.reviewText: This is a great trimmer for any length of hair to be trimmed or shaved. It doesn't cut exceptionally close so I follow it with my regular foil razor and get an awesome shave, as a trimmer I love it, you can't go wrong. I also have sensitive skin and have had no issues with it. My only criticism is the charger is a USB not a plug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Razor, Makes Dry Shaving so Simple and Easy
reviews.reviewText: This electric razor is honestly just amazing overall, I can promise you that you won’t regret the purchase, i’ve never gotten nicked or cut even when being sort of careless, holds a good charge as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one that we have purchased and the only reason that we had to buy another is because the charger was lost or misplaced. My son uses it in the shower and likes that it is waterproof. The trimmer is great for quick touch ups and for complete shaves. His skin is sensitive and the trimmer and shaver works well and leaves his skin very soft and smooth. He specifically requested this exact product again for a reason. It works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It ain't a blade, but pretty close
reviews.reviewText: I am pleasantly surprised with this OneBlade. It is lightweight and easily charged and handled. I seem to prefer pulling it on the backside to going forward, especially on the sides. For the winter, I'm just doing my face, but in the summer will do the head with it too. Gets closer than the other shavers I have tried. Haven't used it wet yet. No need. Gets almost as good as a razor, and I'll probably just shave every other day. I'm retired, so I ain't got to be what people would call clean cut all the time, but if I did, a quick touch up every day would be just fine. I would say it actually works better than I had hoped for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small surface area
reviews.reviewText: Works well but it’s way too small of a surface area takes a very long time to cover the full face and neck, the blade can definitely be a bit larger. The battery is also trash the manual says it takes 8 hours to charge and it only works for like 30 min and doesn’t work while plugged in so you might find yourself in a difficult situation more often than not.

With no guard on it, you’ll get a very smooth shave with no razor, bumps or cuts. You don’t even need shaving cream or anything to get a smooth shave. The battery life last a while even after using it for a week and not charging it.
Básicamente lo uso para recortar vello corporal, hasta el momento tiene buen rendimiento y cumple con las funciones para las que lo adquirí por lo que me resulta útil.
So far I’m am very satisfied with the product. Shipping was quick and item was exactly as described.

Es una herramienta revolucionaria que te permite afeitarte y recortarte de forma rápida, fácil y cómoda, puedes usarla para recortar el vello de tu cuerpo, como las piernas, las axilas o el pecho.Simplemente enciéndela, desliza la cuchilla por tu piel y disfruta de un afeitado o recorte perfecto.
